transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Good morning, main Kashish baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART headquarter se.
Customer: Ji ji ma'am.
Executive: Aapki meri baat hui thi 14 November ko na, jisme maine aapko video call pe saari cheeze guide kar di thi ma'am. Kaise application karna hai. Aapne dobara kuch hamare paas concern bheja tha kya video meeting ke regarding?
Customer: Nahi dobara toh nahi ji kiya tha ma'am. Actually call wagairah jis tarah aapne mujhe bataya tha, waise toh maine kiya tha aur thoda sa busy ye busy schedule chal raha tha toh kuch aur ek do din call kar paye.
Executive: Nahi nahi hamare paas dobara se hamare paas dobara se concern raise hua hai ke client has been shown interest in video meeting by android phone or app. That's why hamare paas dobara se ticket raise hua hai. Toh woh hamare senior ne aapko kiya hoga ma'am.
Customer: Ek baar puch lo aap unse jisko services use karni hai na.
Executive: Aur mujhe bata dijiye, main line pe hu aap puch ke mujhe bata do. Kyuki mujhe concern close karna rahega.
Customer: Ah ma'am do minute time dijiye, woh thoda sa abhi busy hai call pe. Unse baat karke main aapko turant phir back call karti hu usi number pe. Thank you.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know about video meeting.

Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to confirm interest in video meeting.

- Executive asked customer to confirm if they need service.

Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back after talking to colleague.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, application, concern
